snippet: Part of the women’s professional baseball world of the 1940s and 50s that inspired the movie “A League of Their Own,” Ms. Sams held a home run record and pitched a perfect game.
abstract: Doris Sams, who pitched a perfect game and set a single-season home run record in the women's professional baseball world of the 1940s and 50s that inspired movie A League of Their Own, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Part of the women’s professional baseball world of the 1940s and 50s that inspired the movie “A League of Their Own,” Ms. Sams held a home run record and pitched a perfect game.

headline.seo: Doris Sams, Women’s Pro Baseball Star, Dies at 85
headline.main: Doris Sams, Pro Baseball Star, Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Doris Sams, Pro Baseball Star, Dies at 85
